Package UserCode.pets

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBubble
    The IBubble instance provides functionality for reading when bubbles leave the aquarium borders
    IPet
    The IPet instance provides functionality for updating pets
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bubble
    Bubble contains all the behaviour and state to represent a Bubble.
    Bubbler
    Bubble contains all the behaviour and state to represent a Bubble.
    JavaFish
    JavaFish contains all the behaviour and state to represent a JavaFish, it must swim back and fourth along the x axis, bounce of the edge of the screen and alwaysface the direction it is traveling.
    OrangeFish
    JavaFish contains all the behaviour ans state to represent a OrangeFish.
    Pet
    Pet is the parent class of all fish classes, it must contain all the common characteristics (fields, methods) required by it's fish children to perform their required functionality.
    Piranha
    JavaFish contains all the behaviour ans state to represent a Piranha.
    Seahorse
    OrangeFish contains all the behaviour and state to represent a Seahorse.
    Urchin
    Urchin contains all the behaviour and state to represent a Urchin.
